local_intent: Lift the grasped garbage can lid upward by 0.1 along the z-axis, ensuring the grasp remains stable before and after the motion.
assumptions: Edge of the garbage can lid is already grasped
Robot is aligned and clear of table edges for an upward lift
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveDelta lift step between CloseGripper and OpenContainer, matching the transfer phase prior to verifying lid open state.
